title: Domain-Specific Knowledge Ontology
description: Consolidated definitions for core technical and conceptual domains within the Ixventure ecosystem.

memory_concepts.summary: Differentiation of 'memory' across system, application, and domain levels.

types.name: System Memory
types.description: Refers to the physical RAM and VRAM of the system. Managed by MemoryManager class using psutil and torch.cuda.

types.name: Application-Level Memory
types.description: Refers to data structures and objects held in runtime memory (V8/Python/C++).

types.name: Domain-Specific Memory
types.description: Conceptual memory representing domain knowledge (embeddings) or search trees (RootMove).

gemini_integration.summary: Patterns for Gemini API and class-based model management.

definitions.name: Gemini (BaseLlm)
definitions.description: Main integration point for the Gemini API. Inherits from BaseLlm; handles async requests, streaming, and API client management.

definitions.name: GeminiModel
definitions.description: Interaction layer with features like retries, parallel calls, and caching.

definitions.name: Configuration
definitions.description: Handled through `setup_gemini_config` functions, including OpenRouter setup.

root_concepts.summary: Polysemous definitions of 'root' across technical contexts.

definitions.meaning: The root node of a tree or graph.
The root directory of the project or application.
The starting move or position in a search tree.
The main module in a Terraform configuration.
The top-level component in a UI hierarchy.

definitions.name: BIMhero.io
definitions.description: Community hub platform for BIM coordinators and AEC professionals.

definitions.name: BIM
definitions.description: Collaborative process for managing digital representations of built assets.

documentation_standards.name: Metadata and Documentation Standards
documentation_standards.summary: Consistent, machine-readable formats for documenting code and Heartwood.

definitions.name: Header Syntax
definitions.description: Standardized [Title], [Section], and [Subsection] markers for article and report generation.

definitions.name: Comment Purpose
definitions.description: Provide machine-readable format for documentation extraction (e.g., C++ Reader::addComment).
